org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.task.message

Class TaskMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.task.message.TaskMessageFactory

  • public class TaskMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Cesar Factory that will do the work of translating between Task(Response) and Messages. The advantage of this class is that if will handle all the different kinds of tasks or messages to be translated.
